requests.title: Need responsive login component with social auth
requests.description: Looking for a modern login component that supports email/password and social authentication (Google, GitHub). Must be fully responsive and include form validation.

applications.message: I can deliver this within 3 days. Check my portfolio for similar work.

requests.title: Dashboard component with charts
requests.description: Need a dashboard component with various chart types (line, bar, pie) using a modern charting library. Should be customizable and support dark mode.

bids.message: I can use Chart.js or D3.js based on your preference
Experienced with Recharts and can deliver in 2 days

requests.title: E-commerce product card component
requests.description: Looking for a reusable product card component with image gallery, price display, add to cart functionality, and wishlist button.

requests.title: Real-time chat component
requests.description: Need a chat component with real-time messaging, typing indicators, and message history. WebSocket integration required.

requests.title: Payment form with Stripe integration
requests.description: Secure payment form component with Stripe Elements integration, supporting card payments and saving payment methods.
